creator: Yevhenii Zavhorodnii
caption: Visitors continue to shop in the grocery section of the supermarket, illuminating goods by phones during a power outage on October 27, 2022 in Kyiv, Ukraine. "Ukrenergo" introduces longer emergency blackouts in Kyiv and the Kyiv Oblast. The reason was new damage to the energy infrastructure as a result of Russian strikes by kamikaze drones.
